original: Lindström, Sven Paul, provinsialläkare, Horred, f. 13/5/03 i Lycksele, Västerb. 1., av skogsinsp. Adolf L. o. PauHne Jonsson. G. 1. 34 m. Margareta Olsson, d. 40; 2. 42 m. sjuksköt. Lieschen Petri. Barn: Kristina f. 43, Agneta 46. — Studiex. i Umeå 22, med. kand. i Upps. 25, med. lic. i Sthlm 30. Assist :läk. v. Sabbatsb. sjukh. kir. avd. tre mån. 30-31, e. läk. o. tf. und:-läk. v. Sjö-Gunnarsbo sanat. tre mån. 30-31, läk. v. Andra flygkåren ett år, tf. und:läk. v. Kristianstads las. med. o. kir. avd. 31, tf. aman. v. Gbgs BB s. å., e. läk. v. Kristianstads las. kir. avd. 32, tredje o. andre und :läk. där 33-36, undrläk. v. Hässleby sanat. 36, v. Kristianstads las. med. avd. 36-37, e. läk. v. Birgittas sjukh. 37-38, för-ordn. som prov:läk. i ett 20-tal distr. 38-41, prov:läk. i Horreds distr. sed. 41, läk. v. alkoholistanst. Västkust-hemmet. Ordf. i Horreds hälsov:nd, led. av Horreds barnav :nd.
translated:
Lindström, Sven Paul, district physician, Horred, born on May 13th, 1903 in Lycksele, Västerbotten County, son of forestry inspector Adolf L and Pauline Jonsson. Married 1st in 1934 to Margareta Olsson, who passed away in 1940; 2nd in 1942 to nurse Lieschen Petri. Children: Kristina (born 1943), Agneta (born 1946). 

He obtained his high school diploma in Umeå in 1922, completed his Bachelor of Medicine degree in Uppsala in 1925, and received his Medical License in Stockholm in 1930. He worked as an assistant doctor at Sabbatsberg Hospital Surgical Department for three months in 1930-1931, as a resident doctor and temporary assistant doctor at Sjö-Gunnarsbo Sanatorium for three months in 1930-1931, as a doctor in the Second Air Corps for one year, temporary assistant doctor at Kristianstad Hospital Medical and Surgical Department in 1931, temporary physician at Gothenburg Maternity Hospital in the same year, doctor at Kristianstad Hospital Surgical Department in 1932, junior and senior assistant doctor there from 1933-1936, resident doctor at Hässleby Sanatorium in 1936, doctor at Kristianstad Hospital Medical Department from 1936-1937, and attending physician at Birgitta's Hospital from 1937-1938. He was appointed as a district physician in about twenty districts from 1938-1941, and has been a district physician in Horred since 1941. He also works as a doctor at Västkust-hemmet Alcohol Institute. He is the chairman of Horred Health Committee and a member of the Horred Child Welfare Committee.

workExperience.name: Sjö-Gunnarsbo Sanatorium
workExperience.jobTitle: Resident Doctor and Temporary Assistant Doctor
